title: i'm hotspotting from my phone (Lolclient.exe)
body:
title ^ and basically when i open league, and it seems after every game, LolClient.exe seems to just chew up my data like fucking crazy. It spikes from 31 BITES a second to 10MB of data usage a second out of no where and will last for up to 20-30 seconds (according to resource monitor). It's just started happening over the past few days and i really can't afford to play games and then just have the data, that 4-5 games would use, be chewed up because of some sort of leak. 

any help?

basically the problem is just the LolClient.exe is being a %%%%. on start up and after every game (main league menu).
